samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 Menu items with icons, text, separator and items submenu.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind local data source with Syncfusion Javascript ES5 Menu component.

samples.name: Scrollable
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to load menu and sub menus with large number of menu items in horizontal / vertical scrollable Syncfusion JavaScript ES5 menu.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize Syncfusion Javascript ES5 Menu popup items by using templates.

samples.name: API
samples.description: This example demonstrates the supported API's and its functionalities of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 Menu.

samples.name: Toolbar Integration
samples.description: This example demonstrates the real use case of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 Menu in web application. It is integrated with toolbar component.
